pullRequest.title: Store win url in cache
pullRequest.bodyText: Updating event reporting for more reliable work of Prebid Server.

nodes.bodyText: replace naming of value1 and value2
Please clarify with Ruslan, if this tests will not fail on another environment bc of http://localhost:8000/
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -17,7 +18,8 @@
         "adm": "adm2",
         "crid": "crid2",
         "w": 300,
-        "h": 600
+        "h": 600,
+        "wurl": "http://localhost:8000/event?t=win&b=BIDID&a=5001&f=i"

commit.message: Add method to define win url for caching and fixing tests

nodes.bodyText:
Please, add new test that verifies calling arguments for eventsService, like:
verify(eventsService).winUrlCaching(eq("bidId1"), eq("accountId"));

Then account declaration is not needed in all remaining tests.
Just change matching args there:
given(eventsService.winUrlCaching(anyString(), any())).willReturn("http://win-url");

any() will match null account ID.
This will keep tests more clean.

No reason for adding all possible values, just use anyString().
Pls check all similar tests.

Pls extract cacheBid.getBid() to separate variable.
Then bidId declaration can be omitted.

commit.message: Minor changes to CacheService and tests

nodes.bodyText: Pls change to Returns value for win URL tracking.

This declaration should be a part of given section.
Pls check all remaining tests.
